'''Philosophies of the Land of Thunder''' is one of the [[Philosophies of the Land]] rewards obtained from the [[Battle Pass]] after purchasing the Gnostic Hymn or Gnostic Chorus.

After reaching the prerequisite levels, collecting the box will prompt the player to choose between one of the following:
{{Card|Philosophies of Transience|5|show_caption=1}}
{{Card|Philosophies of Elegance|5|show_caption=1}}
{{Card|Philosophies of Light|5|show_caption=1}}
